full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Intermediate Technicians
### Solicitation Number: WS4533278973
### Publication Date: April 24, 2024

### Amendment Information
Amendment 2 to the solicitation WS4533278973 was posted on May 29, 2024.

### Tender Details
- **Title:** Intermediate Technicians
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4533278973
- **Closing Date:** June 10, 2024 - 2:00 PM EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 31, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** November 30, 2024

### Contract Specifications
The Government of Canada is soliciting bids from qualified suppliers for the provision of Intermediate Technicians services under Supply Arrangement E60ZT-18TSPS.

- **Service Category:** 5.2 - Technician, Reliability Status, Ontario, Intermediate
- **Scope:** Heavy truck maintenance and repair

### Trade Agreements
This requirement is open to suppliers who are registered under several trade agreements, including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Contracting Entity
- **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)** 
- **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
- **Name:** Carmen Song, PSPC
- **Email:** carmen.song@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information
- **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19505847?extsite=MTk1MDU4NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Notice URL (French):** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19505847?extsite=MTk1MDU4NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that you must be a registered supplier under Supply Arrangement E60ZT-18TSPS to submit a bid. Bids must be submitted by June 10, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT to be considered responsive. Late bids will not be accepted.
